title: What are the similarities and differences between different types of plants? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would start with basic taxa. Some easy ways to find differences and similarities would involve following the family tree. Trees for example that are deciduous compared to trees that are not. Dicots and monocots. On and on. To be honest, I'm having a hard time trying to limit ways you can compare different types of plants. That's like asking someone to compare different animals, or rocks. Where do you begin?
